entry.title: Python & Internet of Things
entry.summary:
Description

Ravi Vagadia - Python & Internet of Things [EuroPython 2015] [20 July 2015] [Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]

There is a lot buzz about the Internet of things and how it's going to be the next big thing in computing. Python can power "things" and is used extensively in network applications, however there isn't much information out there about where Python can be used to build end-to- end IoT products.

Goals : To put into perspective the usefulness of Python in building IoT products. Spread awareness on possibilities of using Python on embedded hardware.
